title: Roadmap of Media Technologies for the Web

discourse.category: Media and Real-Time Communications category of W3Câ€™s discourse forum

pages.title: Media rendering
pages.description: Features needed to render media content on one or more devices.

pages.title: Media control
pages.description: Features needed to let the user interact with the playback of media content, both via local and remote interactions.

pages.title: Media transmission
pages.description: Features that help with transmitting media content from its source to its rendering target.

pages.title: Media processing
pages.description: Features needed to analyze or modify media content.

pages.title: Content orchestration
pages.description: Features needed to synchronize multiple media or non-media content together, on one or several devices.

pages.title: Media capture
pages.description: Features needed to capture media content from a variety of available sources.

pages.title: Media application development
pages.description: Platform features and best practices to develop media applications on the Web
